content: Submissions to Leaning In! 20226 are coming in! I'm happy to report that @Markus Himmel will be speaking on recent work on software verification in Lean. We still have a number of slots open, so if you've got anything neat in Lean that you'd like to show us in Berlin, go ahead and submit your talk!
A second talk has been accepted: @Sorrachai Yingchareonthawornchai will be telling us all about the exciting CSLib project!
I was there last time and had a nice time; I would recommend others to go. Sadly, mostly likely I will be unable to attend next year because of a time conflict.
